row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT# = "" :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_NAME# = "" !Parse config string :SET &UC4RB_STRING_SEPARATOR# = ";" :IF &UC4RB_CONFIG_STRING# <> "" : DEFINE &CONFIG_ARRAY#, string, 100 : FILL &CONFIG_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONFIG_STRING#, &UC4RB_STRING_SEPARATOR#) : SET &CONFIG_ARRAY_LEN# = LENGTH(&CONFIG_ARRAY#[],SIZE) :ELSE : SET &CONFIG_ARRAY_LEN# = 0 :ENDIF
!Loop through config array :SET &VAR# = 1 :WHILE &VAR# LE &CONFIG_ARRAY_LEN# ! Now get key and value : IF &CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#] <> "" : SET &EQUAL_MARK_POS#=STR_FIND(&CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#],"=") : IF &EQUAL_MARK_POS# <> "0" : SET &FIRST_CUT_POS# = SUB(&EQUAL_MARK_POS#, 1); : SET &SECOND_CUT_POS# = ADD(&EQUAL_MARK_POS#, 1); : SET &LEN# = STR_LNG(&CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#])
: SET &KEY# = STR_CUT(&CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#], 1, &FIRST_CUT_POS#) : SET &KEY# = STR_TRIM(&KEY#) : SET &VALUE# = STR_CUT(&CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#], &SECOND_CUT_POS#, &LEN#) : SET &VALUE# = STR_RTRIM(&VALUE#) ! Get Section by TargetOS & Ini Type : DEFINE &SECTION#, string : IF &UC4RB_IS_AGENT# = "YES" : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "Windows" : SET &SECTION# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.VARA.AGENT_INI_SECTION_MAPPING@WINDOWS", &KEY#, 1) : ELSE : SET &SECTION# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.VARA.AGENT_INI_SECTION_MAPPING@UNIX", &KEY#, 1) : ENDIF ! Publish some importance variable ! Agent's Name : IF &KEY# = "name" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_NAME# = &VALUE# : ENDIF : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "Windows" : SET &SECTION# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.VARA.SM_INI_SECTION_MAPPING@WINDOWS", &KEY#, 1) : ELSE : SET &SECTION# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.VARA.SM_INI_SECTION_MAPPING@UNIX", &KEY#, 1) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT#, "&SECTION#|&KEY#|&VALUE#") : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : IF &VAR# LE &CONFIG_ARRAY_LEN# : SET &UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT#, ",") : ENDIF : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_IS_AGENT# = "YES" : STOP MSG, 50, "Invalid syntax for Agent's INI props string. Couldn't find ""="" symbol in setting ""&CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#]"". Your INI props string is ""&UC4RB_CONFIG_STRING#""" : ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "Invalid syntax for Service Manager's INI props string. Couldn't find ""="" symbol in setting ""&CONFIG_ARRAY#[&VAR#]"". Your INI props string is ""&UC4RB_CONFIG_STRING#""" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDIF :ENDWHILE
:PSET &UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT# = "&UC4RB_RESULT_MAPPING_OUTPUT#" :PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_NAME# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_NAME#"
